scripts.docker:build: docker build -f docker/Dockerfile.app -t atm-app . && docker build -f docker/Dockerfile.preprocessor -t atm-preprocessor .
scripts.docker:up: npm run docker:network && docker run -d --name atm-preprocessor --network atm-network --env-file .env -v $(pwd)/data:/app/data:rw atm-preprocessor && docker run -d --name atm-app --network atm-network --env-file .env -p 3000:3000 -v $(pwd)/data:/app/data:rw atm-app
scripts.docker:down: docker stop atm-app atm-preprocessor || true && docker rm atm-app atm-preprocessor || true
scripts.docker:logs: docker logs -f atm-app & docker logs -f atm-preprocessor
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up
